command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2fBkiNFiDGExDsE.fc940ce39930 --database jkvEoGLbv7QkcKGpVwBVtE --execute

SELECT 'team_members', COUNT(*) FROM team_members WHERE documentId = 1;
